options.explain:
Applies the following, depending on the total of Attack Speed options (+/-) on your equipped armor, accessories, and Special Equipment.
- 100 to below 120%: Skill Atk. +10%
- 120 to below 140%: Skill Atk. +20%
- 140% or more: Skill Atk. +30%

- 120 to below 140%: Skill Atk. +20%
- 140% or more: Skill Atk. +30%

options.explain:
Consumes 99% of HP and restricts 99% of max usable HP upon entering dungeons.
Incoming damage consumes MP before HP.
Restores MP by 25% of HP healed by equipment and HP-healing skills.
options.explainDetail:
Consumes 99% of HP and restricts 99% of max usable HP upon entering dungeons. (HP can't be restored past this restriction.)
Incoming damage consumes MP before HP.
Restores MP by 25% of HP healed by equipment and HP-healing skills.

options.explain:
Fire Dragon Energy +4 when attacking
Damage Value +3126 for 10 sec. when gaining Fire Dragon Energy

Enter the command (Left + Right + [Equipment Option Control key]) to activate the Fire Dragon's Fury buff.
options.explainDetail:
Fire Dragon Energy +4 when attacking (Cooldown: 1 sec. Max Fire Dragon Energy: 44.)
Damage Value +3,126 for 10 sec. when gaining Fire Dragon Energy (Max Stacks: 1. Canceled by Fire Dragon's Fury buff.)

Enter the command (Left + Right + [Equipment Option Control key]) to activate the Fire Dragon's Fury buff with the following effects. (Cooldown: 10 sec.)
- Furious Fire Dragon Energy +44 when casting the Fire Dragon's Fury buff
- Attacks generate Furious Fire Dragon Energy instead of Fire Dragon Energy.
- At 44 Furious Fire Dragon Energy, use 44 Energy and cast a Clear Cube Fragment skill to activate the Rampage buff that increases Skill Atk. +10% for 7 sec.
- Skill cooldown +20%
- Reenter the command to cancel the Fire Dragon's Fury buff and gain 44 Fire Dragon Energy.

(This command, if used while you're equipped with normal and fused [Equipment Option Control key] equipment, uses the fused equipment's [Equipment Option Control key] first.)
